live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area.  Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37634.summary: Some customers in the Ellerslie area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37634.title: May 23 – Edmonton (Ellerslie) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37633.summary: Some customers in the Saddle Ridge area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37633.title: May 23 – Calgary (Saddle Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
